<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	F-31
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage103"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D159244D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	AMDOCS LIMITED
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS&nbsp;&#151;&nbsp;(Continued)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	(dollar and share amounts in thousands, except per share data)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Rent expense net of sublease income was approximately $53,164, $47,032 and $45,032 for
	fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively. The Company had no committed future sublease income as of September&nbsp;30, 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:2%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Legal Proceedings
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company is involved in various legal claims
	and proceedings arising in the normal course of its business. The Company accrues for a loss contingency when it determines that it is probable, after consultation with counsel, that a liability has been incurred and the amount of such loss can be
	reasonably estimated. At this time, the Company believes that the results of any such contingencies, either individually or in the aggregate, will not have a material adverse effect on the Company&#146;s financial position, results of operations or
	cash flows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company is currently defending a lawsuit against certain of its subsidiaries in Oregon District Court alleging
	breach of contract and trade secret misappropriation. According to the suit, the Company improperly utilized information received from the plaintiff in connection with its electronic payment processing solution, which is one of several components of
	its mobile financial services offerings. During fiscal year 2016, the District Court denied the Company&#146;s motions to dismiss and to compel arbitration with respect to certain of the claims, and the proceedings will continue. The Company intends
	to continue to vigorously defend against the allegations set forth in the complaint. At this stage, the Company cannot determine that a loss amount is probable and is unable to reasonably estimate the ultimate outcome of the above suit, therefore no
	amounts have been accrued related to the outcome of the suit above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:2%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Guarantor&#146;s Accounting and Disclosure
	Requirements for Guarantees
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the ordinary course of its business, the Company provides certain customers with
	financial performance guarantees which, in certain cases, are backed by lines of credit. The Company is only liable for the amounts of those guarantees in the event of the Company&#146;s nonperformance, which would permit the customer to exercise
	the guarantee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company generally offers its products with a limited warranty for a period of 90 days or more. The
	Company&#146;s policy is to accrue for warranty costs, if needed, based on historical trends in product failure. Based on the Company&#146;s experience, only minimal warranty charges have been required after revenue was fully recognized and, as a
	result, the Company did not accrue any amounts for product warranty liability during fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
	Company generally indemnifies its customers against claims made by third parties arising from the use of the Company&#146;s software and certain other matters. To date, the Company has incurred and recorded immaterial costs as a result of such
	obligations in its consolidated financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Note 16 &#151; Employee Benefits
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company accrues severance pay for the employees of its Israeli operations in accordance with Israeli law and certain employment
	procedures on the basis of the latest monthly salary paid to these employees and the length of time that they have worked for the Israeli operations. The severance pay liability amounted to $240,414 and $216,946 as of September&nbsp;30, 2016 and
	2015, respectively, and is included as accrued employee costs in other noncurrent liabilities. This liability is partially funded by amounts on deposit with insurance companies that totaled $185,836 and $170,816 as of September&nbsp;30, 2016 and
	2015, respectively, and are included in other noncurrent assets. The accrued severance expenses were $34,165, $31,086 and $27,490 for fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	F-32
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D159244D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	AMDOCS LIMITED
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS&nbsp;&#151;&nbsp;(Continued)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	(dollar and share amounts in thousands, except per share data)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company sponsors defined contribution plans covering certain of its employees around
	the world. The plans primarily provide for Company matching contributions based upon a percentage of the employees&#146; contributions. The Company&#146;s contributions in fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014 under such plans were not material compared
	to total operating expenses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company maintains non-contributory defined benefit plans that provide for pension, other
	retirement and post-employment benefits for certain employees of a Canadian subsidiary based on length of service and rate of pay. The Company accrues its obligations to these employees under employee benefit plans and the related costs net of
	returns on plan assets. Pension expense and other retirement benefits earned by employees are actuarially determined using the projected benefit method pro-rated on service and based on management&#146;s best estimates of expected plan investments
	performance, salary escalation, retirement ages of employees, discount rate, inflation and expected health care costs. The fair value of the employee benefit plans&#146; assets is based on market values. The plan assets are valued at market value
	for the purpose of calculating the expected return on plan assets and the amortization of experienced gains and losses. The Company recognized the funded status of such plans in the balance sheet. The pension and other benefits costs related to the
	non-contributory defined benefit plans were immaterial in fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Note 17 &#151; Stock Option and Incentive Plan
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In January 1998, the Company adopted the 1998 Stock Option and Incentive Plan, or Equity Incentive Plan, which provides
	for the grant of restricted stock awards, stock options and other equity-based awards to employees, officers, directors, and consultants. The purpose of the Equity Incentive Plan is to enable the Company to attract and retain qualified personnel and
	to motivate such persons by providing them with an equity participation in the Company. Since its adoption, the Equity Incentive Plan has been amended on several occasions to, among other things, increase the number of ordinary shares issuable under
	the Equity Incentive Plan and extend its term. The maximum number of ordinary shares currently authorized to be granted under the Equity Incentive Plan is 62,300. Awards granted under the Equity Incentive Plan generally vest over a period of four
	years and stock options have a term of ten years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The following table summarizes information about options to purchase the
	Company
<B>
	&#146;
</B>
	s ordinary shares, as well as changes during the fiscal year ended September&nbsp;30, 2016:
</FONT>
</P>

	The total income tax benefit recognized in the consolidated statements of income for stock-based
	compensation (including restricted shares) for fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014 was $4,503, $5,490 and $5,295, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As of September&nbsp;30, 2016, there was $38,352 of unrecognized compensation expense related to unvested stock options and unvested
	restricted shares. The Company recognizes compensation costs using the graded vesting attribution method, which results in a weighted average period of approximately one year over which the unrecognized compensation expense is expected to be
	recognized.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The amounts payable as a result of the July&nbsp;26, 2016, July&nbsp;29, 2015 and July&nbsp;29, 2014
	declarations were included in accrued expenses and other current liabilities as of September&nbsp;30, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	On November&nbsp;8, 2016, the Company&#146;s Board of Directors approved the next quarterly dividend payment, at the rate of $0.195 per share, and set December&nbsp;30, 2016 as the record date for
	determining the shareholders entitled to receive the dividend, which is payable on January&nbsp;13, 2017.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	On November&nbsp;8,
	2016, the Company&#146;s Board of Directors also approved, subject to shareholder approval at the January 2017 annual general meeting of shareholders, an increase in the quarterly cash dividend to $0.22 per share, anticipated to be paid in April
	2017.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For the fiscal years ended September&nbsp;30, 2016, 2015 and 2014, 1,785, 724 and 1,064 shares,
	respectively, on a weighted average basis, were attributable to antidilutive outstanding stock options and therefore were not included in the calculation of diluted earnings per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Note 20 &#151; Segment Information and Sales to Significant Customers
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
	Company and its subsidiaries operate in one operating segment, providing software products and services for the communications, entertainment and media industry service providers.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The following is a summary of revenue and long-lived assets by geographic area. Revenue is attributed to geographic region based on the
	location of the customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;&nbsp;

	include the following offerings: digital experience for consumer multiplay and business customers, network solutions, Internet of Things (IoT), customer operational intelligence, mobile financial services and Amdocs Optima. Customer experience
	solutions also include a comprehensive line of services such as thought leadership&nbsp;&amp; advisory services, systems integration, transformation services, managed services, network services, digital business operations for order to activation,

<B>
<I>
	Sales to Significant Customers
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company had one customer that accounted for at least ten percent of its total revenue in each of fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014. The
	percentage of revenue from this customer out of total revenue during fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014 was 33%, 34% and 33%, respectively.
</FONT>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.b.5
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Reinstatement and Amendment
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	No.&nbsp;02026713.A.040
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Between
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Amdocs, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	And
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Proprietary
	Information
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	The&nbsp;information&nbsp;contained&nbsp;in&nbsp;this&nbsp;Agreement&nbsp;is&nbsp;not&nbsp;for&nbsp;use&nbsp;or&nbsp;disclosure&nbsp;
	outside&nbsp;AT&amp;T,&nbsp;Supplier,&nbsp;their&nbsp;Affiliates&nbsp;and&nbsp;their&nbsp;third&nbsp;party
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	representatives, except under
	written agreement by the contracting Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	REINSTATEMENT AND AMENDMENT NO. 40
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This
	Reinstatement and Amendment No.&nbsp;40, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or
	&#147;Amdocs&#148;), and AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, the Agreement expired by its terms on January&nbsp;31, 2016 (the &#147;Prior Expiration Date&#148;); and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, after such Prior Expiration Date, the Parties continued to perform under the Agreement as if it had not expired, and with the intention of
	extending its term; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to revive the Agreement and to extend its term and to formalize the validity and
	continuation of the Agreement since its Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003;
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the
	covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to Agreement 02026713 as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	The Agreement is revived; the term is extended as set forth below; and the Agreement shall be deemed to have been in effect continuously since the Agreement Effective Date. The Parties further ratify all actions
	taken by them under the Agreement between the Prior Expiration Date and the date when this Amendment is effective.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32. Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on February&nbsp;29, 2016, unless
	earlier Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Proprietary
	Information
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	The&nbsp;information&nbsp;contained&nbsp;in&nbsp;this&nbsp;Agreement&nbsp;is&nbsp;not&nbsp;for&nbsp;use&nbsp;or&nbsp;disclosure&nbsp;
	outside&nbsp;AT&amp;T,&nbsp;Supplier,&nbsp;their&nbsp;Affiliates&nbsp;and&nbsp;their&nbsp;third&nbsp;party
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	representatives, except under
	written agreement by the contracting Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms and conditions of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain
	unmodified and in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</B>
	, the Parties have caused this Reinstatement and Amendment to Agreement No. 02026713 to
	be executed, which may be in duplicate counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute only one instrument, as of the date the last Party signs.
</P>

	Information

<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Amendment
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	No.&nbsp;02026713.A.041
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Between
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Amdocs, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	And
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Proprietary
	Information
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	The&nbsp;information&nbsp;contained&nbsp;in&nbsp;this&nbsp;Agreement&nbsp;is&nbsp;not&nbsp;for&nbsp;use&nbsp;or&nbsp;disclosure&nbsp;
	outside&nbsp;AT&amp;T,&nbsp;Supplier,&nbsp;their&nbsp;Affiliates&nbsp;and&nbsp;their&nbsp;third&nbsp;party
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	representatives, except under
	written agreement by the contracting Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage115"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 41
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;41, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on March&nbsp;31, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	The Parties agree that Amendment 34 erroneously deleted and replaced
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
	of
<B>
	Appendix 8, &#147;AT&amp;T Supplier Information Security Requirements and Limited Offshore Remote Access&#148;,
</B>
	in its entirety, and the Appendix 8 Section&nbsp;3 and subsections are reinstated and shall be deemed to have been in effect continuously since the corresponding Agreement Effective Date as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<A NAME="eolPage118"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 42
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;42, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>

<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,

</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on April&nbsp;30, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage121"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 43
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;43, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on May&nbsp;31, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Proprietary
	Information
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	The&nbsp;information&nbsp;contained&nbsp;in&nbsp;this&nbsp;Agreement&nbsp;is&nbsp;not&nbsp;for&nbsp;use&nbsp;or&nbsp;disclosure&nbsp;
	outside&nbsp;AT&amp;T,&nbsp;Supplier,&nbsp;their&nbsp;Affiliates&nbsp;and&nbsp;their&nbsp;third&nbsp;party
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	representatives, except under
	written agreement by the contracting Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9.5PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	The terms and conditions of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain
	unmodified and in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</B>
	, the Parties have caused this Amendment to Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 to be executed,
	which may be in duplicate counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute only one instrument, as of the date the last Party signs.

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 44
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;44, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on June&nbsp;30, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

	Information

<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 45
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;45, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on July&nbsp;31, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms and conditions
	of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain unmodified and in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</B>
	, the
	Parties have caused this Amendment to Agreement No. 02026713 to be executed, which may be in duplicate counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute only one instrument, as of the date the
	last Party signs.
</P>

</P>
<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 46
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;46, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on August&nbsp;31, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms and conditions
	of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain unmodified and in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</B>
	, the
	Parties have caused this Amendment to Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 to be executed, which may be in duplicate counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute only one instrument, as of the date
	the last Party signs.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 47
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;47, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on October&nbsp;31, 2016, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms and conditions
	of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain unmodified and in full force and effect.

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Amendment
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	No.&nbsp;020267 13.A.048

<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO.48
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;48, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&middot;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#146;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on November&nbsp;30, 2016, unless
	earlier Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms and
	conditions of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain unmodified and in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	IN WITNESS
	WHEREOF
</B>
	, the Parties have caused this Amendment to Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 to be executed, which may be in duplicate counterparts, each of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute only one instrument,
	as of the date the last Party signs.
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	AMENDMENT NO. 49

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	AGREEMENT NO. 02026713
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Amendment
	No.&nbsp;49, effective on the date when signed by the last Party (&#147;Effective Date&#148;), and amending Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713, is by and between Amdocs, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Supplier&#148; or &#147;Amdocs&#148;), and
	AT&amp;T Services, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;AT&amp;T&#148;), each of which may be referred to in the singular as a &#147;Party&#148; or in the plural as the &#147;Parties&#148;.

	WITNESSETH
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS,
</B>
	AT&amp;T and
	Amdocs are parties to that certain Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 for Software and Professional Services, dated as of August&nbsp;7, 2003, (as previously amended, the &#147;Agreement&#148;) and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	WHEREAS
</B>
	, AT&amp;T and Supplier now desire to further amend the Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the premises and the covenants hereinafter contained, the Parties hereto agree to changes to the Agreement as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
	For purposes of extending the term of the Agreement,
<B>
	Section
</B>
<B>
</B>

	&nbsp;3.32, &#147;Term of Agreement&#148;
</B>
	, is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3.32 Term of Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Agreement with an Effective Date of August&nbsp;7, 2003, shall remain in effect for a term ending on January&nbsp;31, 2017, unless earlier
	Terminated or Canceled as provided in this Agreement. The Parties may extend the term of this Agreement by agreement in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	Proprietary Information
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	The information contained in this Agreement is not for use or disclosure outside AT&amp;T, Supplier, their Affiliates and their third
	party
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:9PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	representatives, except under written agreement by the contracting Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage136"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
	Agreement Number 02026713.A.049
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms and conditions of Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 as previously amended in all other respects remain unmodified and in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF
</B>
	, the Parties have caused this Amendment to Agreement No.&nbsp;02026713 to be executed, which may be in duplicate counterparts, each
	of which will be deemed to be an original but all of which together shall constitute only one instrument, as of the date the last Party signs.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

</TR>
<TR>

<A NAME="eolPage138"></A>
<A NAME="D159244DEX121_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_12>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_12"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	EXHIBIT&nbsp;12.1
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	CERTIFICATIONS
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	I, Eli
	Gelman, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.&nbsp;I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;20-F of Amdocs Limited;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact
	necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and
	cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.&nbsp;The company&#146;s other certifying
	officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act
	Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the company and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)&nbsp;Designed such disclosure controls and
	procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those
	entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)&nbsp;Designed such
	internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of
	financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)&nbsp;Evaluated the effectiveness of the company&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report
	our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation;&nbsp;and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)&nbsp;Disclosed in this report any change in the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred
	during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting;&nbsp;and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.&nbsp;The company&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over
	financial reporting, to the company&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the company&#146;s Board of Directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)&nbsp;All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over
	financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the company&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information;&nbsp;and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)&nbsp;Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in
	the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="40%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE">

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	/s/ Eli Gelman
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:1.00EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.00EM">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	President and Chief Executive Officer
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:1.00EM; TEXT-INDENT:-1.00EM">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

</B>
</FONT>

</B>

	Rapaport-Dagim, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.&nbsp;I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;20-F of Amdocs Limited;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact
	necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and
	cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.&nbsp;The company&#146;s other certifying
	officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act
	Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the company and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)&nbsp;Designed such disclosure controls and
	procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those
	entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)&nbsp;Designed such
	internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of
	financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)&nbsp;Evaluated the effectiveness of the company&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report
	our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation;&nbsp;and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)&nbsp;Disclosed in this report any change in the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred
	during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting;&nbsp;and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.&nbsp;The company&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over
	financial reporting, to the company&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the company&#146;s Board of Directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)&nbsp;All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over
	financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the company&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information;&nbsp;and
</FONT>

	the company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.

<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18&nbsp;U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In connection with the annual report on Form&nbsp;20-F of Amdocs Limited (the &#147;Company&#148;) for the period ended
	September&nbsp;30, 2016 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), the undersigned, Eli Gelman, Chief Executive Officer of the Company, hereby certifies, pursuant to 18&nbsp;U.S.C.
	Section&nbsp;1350, that to the best of his knowledge and belief:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(1)&nbsp;the Report fully complies with the
	requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934;&nbsp;and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(2)&nbsp;the
	information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

	EXHIBIT 14.1
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We consent to the reference to
	our firm in the head note to Item&nbsp;3. Key Information &#151; Selected Financial Data included in this Annual Report (Form 20-F) of Amdocs Limited and to the incorporation by reference in the following Registration Statements:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Form S-8, No.&nbsp;333-91847
</FONT>
</P>
